character.age: Ageless, appears to be in her mid-200s
character.role: Druid and Healer of the Moonwhisper Clan
character.background: Eira was born under the light of a full moon in the ancient forest of Ashenvale. She was chosen by the moon goddess Elune to wield the power of the druids, and has spent centuries honing her skills as a healer and protector of the natural world.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark brown with subtle highlights of silver
